mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chief's Letter; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 25; "Apache Chief's Letter Signed by Thumb Print"; Describes how an Apache Chief used a thumb print signature on a government document, and how this form of signature is accepted when natives cannot speak or write English.; Special dispatch to The New York Herald; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
